name: evista-starter-theme-parcel
description: Evista Starter Theme with Parcel Bundler and Sass for Wordpress

scripts.watch: node node_modules/parcel-bundler/bin/cli.js watch assets/index.js --out-dir build/ --out-file bundle
scripts.build: node node_modules/parcel-bundler/bin/cli.js build assets/index.js --out-dir build/ --out-file bundle

author: Zsolt Schutzbach <schutzbach.zsolt@e-vista.hu>
